content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, glad to meet you. I must say, you have a great taste in apartments. This one is a real gem, isn't it? Now, let's get down to business. I'm sure you're aware of the current market rates in Duisburg, and I'm confident that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. What's your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I think 500 euros per month is a fair price, given the location and condition of the apartment. 

[Your response]
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
I see. Well, I must say, you're a tough negotiator, Mr. Abbasi. I was thinking more along the lines of 800 euros per month. After all, the apartment is brand new and located in the heart of the city. It's a real gem, if I do say so myself.

But I'm willing to make a compromise. How about we settle on 650 euros per month? That way, we can both walk away from this negotiation feeling like we've gotten a good deal. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [600] Euro!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
I'm glad we could come to an agreement, Mr. Abbasi. 600 euros it is, then. I'll just need you to sign a few papers and we'll get the keys to you as soon as possible.

Oh, and one more thing. I'm afraid I'll need a security deposit of 1,000 euros. Just a standard procedure, you understand. It'll be returned to you in full when you move out, provided there's no damage to the apartment.

What do you say? Are we all set?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I'm glad you're excited about the apartment, Mr. Abbasi. I'm confident that you'll be very happy here. Now, let's get down to business.

I'll need you to sign a lease agreement, which outlines the terms of your tenancy. It's a standard contract, nothing out of the ordinary. And, of course, I'll need the security deposit of 1,000 euros, which I mentioned earlier.

Once that's all taken care of, I'll give you the keys to your new apartment. I'm sure you'll be eager to start moving in and making it your own.

Is there anything else you need help with? I'm here to make your transition as smooth as possible. Just let me know what you need, and I'll do my best to assist you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we already agreed on the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
I apologize for the confusion. You're right, we did agree on the rental price of 600 euros per month. My apologies for bringing up the security deposit again.

In that case, let's proceed with the lease agreement. I'll need you to sign the contract and provide the necessary documents, such as your ID and proof of income. Once that's all taken care of, I'll give you the keys to your new apartment.

Is there anything else you need help with? I'm here to make your transition as smooth as possible. Just let me know what you need, and I'll do my best to assist you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
